snippet.title: Young Souls - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
People call them outcasts. Screw people.

From The Arcade Crew (Blazing Chrome, Dark Devotion) and 1P2P (Inside My Radio - winner of Ludem Dare 23,) comes a touching and exciting new tale about life, family, adventure, and saving the world: Young Souls

Young Souls draws you in with its distinct art direction but keeps you playing via a deeply narrative-driven RPG beat-em-up that features clever crossover mechanics. 

Follow the game updates @TheArcadeCrew on Twitter and Facebook!

© The Arcade Crew - 1P2P - 2018, all rights reserved.
Rated M:  “Drug Reference, Fantasy Violence, Strong Language”
